Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - A Silicon Valley startup unveiled a quantum computing prototype, promising breakthroughs in data encryption by 2026.
LONDON (AP) - Manchester United secured a 3-1 victory over Arsenal, with a stunning free-kick from their new striker sealing the match.
SYDNEY - Scientists discovered a new species of deep-sea fish off the Australian coast, raising hopes for advanced marine conservation efforts.
BEIJING (Reuters) - China launched a new satellite to enhance its global navigation system, aiming to rival GPS by next year.
ATHENS (AP) - A Greek sprinter set a personal best in the 200-meter race, earning a spot in the upcoming world championships.
GENEVA - The United Nations called for urgent climate action as record-breaking heatwaves swept across Europe, prompting new policy discussions.
BOSTON (Sports Network) - The Celtics clinched a playoff spot with a 105-98 win over the Knicks, led by a rookie’s 30-point performance.
TOKYO (Reuters) - A Japanese robotics firm debuted a humanoid assistant designed for elderly care, sparking debates on automation ethics.
CAPE TOWN (AFP) - South Africa’s cricket team defeated India by 15 runs in a thrilling Test match, boosting their series lead.
MOSCOW - A new cybersecurity treaty was proposed at an international summit, aiming to curb state-sponsored hacking incidents.
